title: Which SEC Quarterbacks will break through this season?
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, and Sam Acho discuss who the 3rd best team in the SEC is, which remaining quarterback competition is the most intriguing, and the best and worst case scenarios for LSU this season. Plus, the crew looks forward to the Week 0 games and makes some bold predictions for the 2022 season.
